png

Class MetadataPNG<T extends BaseMetadata>

  • java.lang.Object
    • png.MetadataPNG<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of metadata unit stored in the PNG structure
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    BaseMetadata, Metadata<T>, java.lang.Iterable<T>

    public class MetadataPNG<T extends BaseMetadata>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Metadata<T>
    A concrete metadata container for PNG files, supporting both embedded Exif data (from eXIf chunks) and textual data (from tEXt, zTXt, iTXt chunks). This class serves as a composite component in the composite design pattern for metadata leaves.
    Since:
    13 August 2025
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Trevor Maggs

    • Method Detail

      • hasTextualData

        public boolean hasTextualData()
        Checks if this PNG metadata contains textual data in its directories. This refers to tEXt, zTXt, or iTXt chunks within the PNG file.
        Returns:
        true if any ChunkDirectory of Category.TEXTUAL is found

      • addDirectory

        public void addDirectory(T directory)
        Adds a metadata directory to this PNG metadata container.
        Specified by:
        addDirectory in interface Metadata<T extends BaseMetadata>
        Parameters:
        directory - the directory to add

      • getDirectory

        public <U> T getDirectory(U component)
        Retrieves a metadata directory based on the given component key. If multiple matches exist, the first encountered match is returned.

        The match strategy depends on the component type:

        • Taggable → finds a ChunkDirectory containing the tag
        • TextKeyword → finds a ChunkDirectory containing the keyword
        • Other → matches the component class type directly
        Specified by:
        getDirectory in interface Metadata<T extends BaseMetadata>
        Type Parameters:
        U - the type of the component being used to look up the directory
        Parameters:
        component - the lookup key or element
        Returns:
        a matching metadata directory, or null if not found

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty()
        Checks if there are no metadata directories.
        Specified by:
        isEmpty in interface Metadata<T extends BaseMetadata>
        Returns:
        true if this metadata container is empty

      • hasMetadata

        public boolean hasMetadata()
        Checks whether any metadata exists.
        Specified by:
        hasMetadata in interface Metadata<T extends BaseMetadata>
        Returns:
        true if at least one metadata directory is present

      • hasExifData

        public boolean hasExifData()
        Determines if any MetadataTIF directory contains embedded Exif data.
        Specified by:
        hasExifData in interface Metadata<T extends BaseMetadata>
        Returns:
        true if Exif data exists
